params.creator: the address of the collection creator.

getCollectionCreator(address).details: used to send royalties part of the raffle.

returns._0: The list of addresses on the whitelist.
True if `collateralToCheck` is on the whitelist, or False.

addToWhitelist(address,address).notice: Adds an address to the whitelist.

getCollectionCreator(address).notice: Return creator address for a specific nft collection.

getWhitelist().notice: Gets all addresses that are currently included in the whitelist.

isWhitelisted(address).notice: Checks whether an address is on the whitelist.

removeFromWhitelist(address).notice: Removes an address from the whitelist.
